about_the_game:
DISCORD:

Description:

Welcome to Angry Tiny Sun, the ultimate cosmic battle where mages wield the power of the Moon while evading the wrath of the Sun! The Tiny Sun, fueled by pure rage, is out to obliterate anyone in possession of the Moon, and it's up to you to dodge its scorching fury.

Gameplay Overview:

In this fast-paced, hot-potato-style game, you'll pass the Moon back and forth with your fellow mages while the Tiny Sun relentlessly chases down whoever holds it. Master your timing and reflexes to outmaneuver your opponents, or strategically unleash devastating spells to turn the tide in your favor.

As a sorcerer on a floating platform in space, you must use the Sun's wrath to your advantage, eliminating every other player until you are the last mage standing. But beware – the Sun's touch means instant elimination!

Features:

Hot-Potato Mayhem: Pass the Moon strategically to outplay your rivals and avoid the Tiny Sun's deadly touch.
Randomly Spawning Spells: Collect random spells that appear throughout the arena, each providing unique powers like shielding, flight, and powerful attacks.
Easy to Learn, Hard to Master: Instantly understand the basics, then refine your skills to dominate the arena with limitless strategies.
No Pay-To-Win PvP Combat: Skill, not money, determines who reigns supreme in the arena.
Flexible Control Options: Play with mouse and keyboard or a controller – the choice is yours.
Vibrant Space Arena: Battle in a beautifully designed platform surrounded by cosmic wonders.
Intense Multiplayer Experience: Compete with friends or players online in fast-paced, elimination-style PvP matches.
